contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{nihongo|'''Nitta'''|新田町|Nitta-machi}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Nitta District, Gunma|Nitta District]], [[Gunma Prefecture|Gunma]], [[Japan]]. On March 28, 2005 Nitta, along with the towns of [[Ojima, Gunma|Ojima]] and [[Yabuzukahon, Gunma|Yabuzukahon]], all from [[Nitta District, Gunma|Nitta District]], was merged into the expanded city of [[Ōta, Gunma|Ōta]]. [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Gunma Prefecture]] {{Gunma-geo-stub}}
